reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A hip-length top, not a tunic, shorter than shown. Very soft, good over pants and skirts
reviews.reviewText: THE FIT: I am 5'6" and weigh 180, with a 40D bust and broad shoulders. The fit is perfect for a long-ish top, but it is definitely NOT tunic-length as shown on the model (she must be 5'2"). It only falls halfway over my bum in back and barely comes to crotch in front. I could never wear over just leggings, but will wear as a shirt over jeans or a skirt. It's comfortably fitted around the bust and shoulders, a little clingy but does not show every flaw. This size would also look good on someone a little thinner, or a little taller, as a top. If I purchase again, might get the 2x.THE FABRIC: The fabric is very comfortable, soft and smooth. It's thin, and breathes, but is not see-through in the dark color I chose.THE COLOR: my monitor is pretty accurate, so I have to say that the vendor photo is not. This green is so dark that at first I thought it was charcoal, then took it into daylight and can see that it's a dark olive, but darker than the photo. It looks and feels great over palazzo pants. Search for Beauty Batik and see plus sizes.UPDATE: I washed it on delicate cycle, warm wash/cold rinse, and hung it over a sweater rack to dry. It did not bleed, did not shrink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice wearing shirt for a good price.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been on a diet and have lost quite a bit of weight but I have a bit more to go. Most of my clothes weren’t fitting me (too big) but since I’m not at my goal I didn’t want to invest a lot of money in clothes right now. These shirts are a great fit and were reasonably priced so I have some great clothing for my transition time. Win, win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and casual
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a set of these tops and they are very comfortable. I didn’t think they are too thin as some people had remarked and liked the fit. The bottom part can disguise a little tummy bulge so of course that was a plus. I may order an additional set because the top is nice and casual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I just wore this shirt last night. It bunches around the waist and it helps to now show a belly. It is soft and comfortable. The material is shiny and that makes it look a little dressy. It's a great shirt to go out in when you want to be comfortable and cute without dressing up too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Actually love these just got em in a medium when I'm a small next time will order small. Material is very soft and love the length. Wish the sleeves were all the way down not mid but really good tops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, well designed, great fit.
reviews.reviewText: This top is fabulous. I bought one, and immediately went back and bought three more in different colors. Having read the reviews, I went one size up (from 2X to 3X) and I'm happy with that fit. It's nice and tailored around the neck, fits well in the shoulders, then flows out nicely skimming the tummy. Doesn't cling too much, so no huge worry on showing bra straps digging in. Sleeves have sufficient room, not too big or small. I think the fact that this product has so many people posting photos is testament to how much people feel good in these tops. I love the Mocha color, it's classy and looks really nice under black and cream work jackets. The purple and navy are deeper and richer colors than the photo would indicate, just lovely, they look expensive. And I have totally fallen in love with rayon as a fabric, the flow and breathability of it works really well. I wouldn't try to wear this with leggings, it's not quite long enough. But it's lovely out over jeans, and really nice tucked in for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars 3/4 sleeve t shirts
reviews.reviewText: VERY thin and deteriorates so easily.Material feels great but to thin.Be careful and maybe hand wash/air dry if want to last.They are flattering on the body.Colors good.Cant let my pup in my lap with this material, catches and tears. I wear under a sweater now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect except pilling
reviews.reviewText: I love these shirts! The fit is perfect and flattering for pretty much any shape. They are extremely comfortable, I want to wear one every day! They do have a tendency to pill up if you put them in the dryer so best to hang dry and wash on gentle cycle.
